name: generate-image-blog-post
description: Generate an image for a blog post
prompt: I would like to create an image from the template image available in this file %TEMPLATE% integrating these elements: - replace 'Writer Name' by %NAME%  - replace 'Post title' by %TITLE%. Please center this title and use 2 lines at maximum. - replace the second white square by the photo from this %PHOTO% file. Please don't modify the name of the author and the title of the blog post.

name: generate-image-2-blog-post
description: Generate an image for a blog post with 2 authors
prompt: I would like to create an image from the template image available in this file %TEMPLATE% integrating these elements: - replace the text 'Name' by %NAME% - replace the text 'Name2' by %NAME2% - replace the text 'Post title' by %TITLE%. Please center this title and use 2 lines at maximum. - replace the first white square by the first author photo from this %PHOTO% file. - replace the second white square by the second author photo from this %PHOTO2% file - Please don't modify the names of the authors and the title of the blog post and the ratio of the photos.

name: generate-image-speaker-event
description: Generate an image to announce a speaker for a conference
prompt: I would like to create an image from the template image available in this file %TEMPLATE% integrating these elements: - replace 'Speaker name' by %NAME%  - replace 'Talk title' by %TITLE%. Please center this title and use 2 lines at maximum. - replace the yellow square by the logo of the conference from the %CONF_PHOTO% file. - replace the white square by the speaker photo from this %PHOTO% file. Please don't modify the name of the author and the title of the talk.

name: generate-image-2-speaker-event
description: Generate an image to announce a talk with 2 speakers for a conference
prompt: I would like to create an image from the template image available in this file %TEMPLATE% integrating these elements: - replace the first 'Speaker Name' by %NAME% - replace the second 'Speaker Name' by %NAME2% - replace 'Talk title' by %TITLE%. Please center this title and use 2 lines at maximum. - replace the first white square by the conference photo from this %CONF_PHOTO% file. - replace the first white square by the first speaker photo from this %PHOTO% file. - replace the second white square by the second speaker photo from this %PHOTO2% file. Please don't modify the names of the speakers and the title of the talk.

name: generate-image-3-speaker-event
description: Generate an image to announce a talk with 3 speakers for a conference
prompt: I would like to create an image from the template image available in this file %TEMPLATE% integrating these elements: - replace the yellow square by the conference photo from this %CONF_PHOTO% file - replace the first 'Speaker Name' by %NAME% - replace the white square with this %PHOTO% file - replace the second 'Speaker Name' by %NAME2% - replace the blue square with this %PHOTO2% file - replace the third 'Speaker Name' by %NAME3% - replace the green square with this %PHOTO3% file - replace 'Talk title' by %TITLE%. Please don't modify the names of the speakers and the title of the talk.

name: generate-video-speaker-event-blog
description: Generate a video to annunce a speaker for a conference
prompt: I'd like to create a short animation with the photo in this file %PHOTO%. Start from a blank white canvas. Elements appear progressively: the blog post title, the author's name, and the author's profile picture slide in smoothly from outside the frame to their final designated positions on the layout, creating a clean and professional motion graphic reveal.

name: generate-post-speaker-event
prompt: I'd like to create two posts in French to announce %NAME% as a speaker for the conference %CONF% presenting the talk '%TITLE%'. The first one is for Linkedin, the second for Bluesky.

name: generate-image-from-prompt
description: Generate an image from a prompt

name: generate-image-duck-from-prompt
description: Generate an image from a prompt and put the Zenika duck on
prompt: I would like to create an image based on this prompt: %PROMPT%. Add the Zenika red duck on the image, smiling and very happy.

name: generate-job-offer
description: Generate an visual to announce a job offer
prompt: I would like to create an image from the template image available in this file %TEMPLATE% integrating these elements: - replace <job title>c by %JOB_TITLE% respecting the colors. Please center this title and use 2 lines at maximum. - replace <city> by %CITY%.

name: generate-image-blog-zenika
description: Generate an image to promote and illustrate a blog post on the Zenika blog
prompt: A professional and minimalist background image for a tech blog post titled '%TITLE%' by %NAME%. The style should be modern and clean. A semi-transparent black layer (60% opacity) overlay all the image. The text '%TITLE%' and 'par %NAME%' must be clearly written in the center in a bold, white, elegant Nunito font.
